availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph L. Powell (Clermont County, Ohio, merchant)

body.p: Clermont County, Ohio, merchant. Kentucky native. Son of John S. Powell and Elizabeth Powell. Married to Juliet Stephenson Powell in Clermont County, Ohio, on October 18, 1842. Married to Margaret Powell. Merchant in Clermont County, Ohio, in 1850. Merchant in Clermont County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Clermont County, Washington Township, p. 26B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Clermont County, Washington Township,Town of Moscow, p. 463.
Ohio Marriage Records, 1774-1993, Clermont County Courthouse, Batavia, Clermont County Marriages, 1814-1845, Film #000327560, p. 420 of 466 of microfilm (accessed via Ancestry.com).
